posts.post_content:
-McGraw has a tiny scratch on the right side by his glove and one going from his ear to the top of the card (this one is barely noticeable).



-The Chase is over-graded.  Not sure how it got above a 1.  The front is decent with 2 creases on the bottom half of the card.  The borders are a little "off-white" from years of being handled I would imagine.  The back has a little paper loss and a bit of some other paper stuck to it.



McGraw- $46 shipped
Chase- $26 shipped

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to PM me.

Paypal gift, or you pay the fees if you prefer regular paypal.  Thanks for looking.
Dropped prices a bit and took off the shipping charge, so all prices are delivered.  Will listen to reasonable offers, especially on multitple cards.
Decided to keep Wallace rather than drop price on him.  Chance is on hold while I see if someone wants to lock it up.

Chance is sold.  There are 2 left.

McGraw $46 shipped
Chase  $26 shipped

I won't bump this thread anymore.  PM if interested.  Thanks.
